dashboard.label: All summary reports by last submission time

search.query: sourcetype="puppet:summary" | eval "certname"=mvdedup('certname'),"run_time"=mvdedup('metrics.time.total') | eval strf_time=strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %T %:z") | eval run_time_rnd=round(run_time,1) | rename certname as "Host" | rename strf_time as "Report Time" | rename run_time_rnd as "Execution Time (seconds)" | sort - "Report Time" | table Host, "Report Time", "Execution Time (seconds)"
